abstract: One of the pleasures of visiting designers' studios is hearing them talk about how a garment is made, or watching them work out a problem with a pattern-maker or tailor. That was the idea behind a conversation I had earlier this month in Paris with Sarah Burton of Alexander McQueen, for a video on Nowness.com.
